channel.title: Help with duping ASAP
channel.description: Hey gies, finnally got my server up, its been running great, but one of the players brought somthing to my attention. He showed me what he calls a "x logg glitch". when a player attacks another player, then stops attacking, then the player he stopped attacking attacks him, and when that player dies, they loog out and when they logg back in, there's 3 times the amount of whatever item laying on the ground, including the original item in the first players bag. Can anyone tell me how to fix x logging(wich will solve this problem?) and also, regualr duping works too... can anyone tell me how to fix that too? thanks so much to anyone who helps.

item.title: Help with duping ASAP
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

I’m not sure, what file is it in?

CAN SOMONE GIVE ME A LINK TO A TUTORIAL ON THIS. THANKS

Read full topic

item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

did you use resetItems(3823); or something? it might stop it from duping

Read full topic

item.title: Help with duping ASAP
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

Hey gies, finnally got my server up, its been running great, but one of the players brought somthing to my attention. He showed me what he calls a “x logg glitch”. when a player attacks another player, then stops attacking, then the player he stopped attacking attacks him, and when that player dies, they loog out and when they logg back in, there’s 3 times the amount of whatever item laying on the ground, including the original item in the first players bag. Can anyone tell me how to fix x logging(wich will solve this problem?) and also, regualr duping works too… can anyone tell me how to fix that too? thanks so much to anyone who helps.

Read full topic
